mapper.select:
SELECT /* ProductMapper.selectAllProducts 원승언 */ PDT_ID , BRAND_CD.DTL_CD_NM AS brandNm , PDT_NM , PDT_PRICE , EXP_DAYNUM , PDT_SELL_STTS_CD.DTL_CD_NM AS pdtSellSttsNm FROM PDT LEFT JOIN COMM_CD_DTL BRAND_CD ON BRAND_CD.DTL_CD = PDT.BRAND_CD LEFT JOIN COMM_CD_DTL PDT_SELL_STTS_CD ON PDT_SELL_STTS_CD.DTL_CD = PDT.PDT_SELL_STTS_CD
PDT_STTS_W = '1'
AND BRAND_CD.DTL_CD = (SELECT DTL_CD FROM COMM_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD_NM = #{brandNm})
AND PDT_NM = #{pdtNm}
AND PDT_SELL_STTS_CD.DTL_CD = (SELECT DTL_CD FROM COMM_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD_NM = #{pdtSellSttsNm})
ORDER BY PDT_ID DESC
SELECT /* ProductMapper.selectAllPdtNm 원승언 */ PDT_NM FROM PDT WHERE PDT_STTS_W = '1'
SELECT /* ProductMapper.selectAllBrandNm 원승언 */ DTL_CD_NM FROM COMM_CD_DTL CCD INNER JOIN COMM_CD CC ON CCD.COMM_CD_ID = CC.COMM_CD_ID WHERE COMM_CD ='BRAND_CD' ORDER BY DTL_CD
SELECT /* ProductMapper.selectAllPdtSellSttsNm 원승언 */ DTL_CD_NM FROM COMM_CD_DTL CC INNER JOIN COMM_CD CD ON CD.COMM_CD_ID = CC.COMM_CD_ID WHERE COMM_CD ='PDT_SELL_STTS_CD' ORDER BY DTL_CD

SELECT /* ProductMapper.selectProductByPdtId 원승언 */ PDT_ID , BRAND_CD.DTL_CD_NM AS brandNm , PDT_NM , PDT_PRICE , EXP_DAYNUM , PDT_SELL_STTS_CD.DTL_CD_NM AS pdtSellSttsNm FROM PDT LEFT JOIN COMM_CD_DTL BRAND_CD ON BRAND_CD.DTL_CD = PDT.BRAND_CD LEFT JOIN COMM_CD_DTL PDT_SELL_STTS_CD ON PDT_SELL_STTS_CD.DTL_CD = PDT.PDT_SELL_STTS_CD
AND PDT_ID = #{pdtId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
